5 zScore::zScore(ros::NodeHandle & node_handle, std::string topic_prefix){
6 
7  topic_prefix = topic_prefix;
8 
9  //Create all topics we will publish values to
10  pub_mean = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>(topic_prefix + "_zScore_mean", 1);
11  pub_positive_threshold = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>(topic_prefix + "_zScore_positive_threshold", 1);
12  pub_negative_threshold = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>(topic_prefix + "_zScore_negative_threshold", 1);
13  pub_signal = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>(topic_prefix + "_zScore_signal", 1);
14  pub_raw_value = node_handle.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>(topic_prefix + "_zScore_raw_value", 1);
15 
16 }

19  this->publish_values = false;

26 double zScore::updateThreshold(double velocity)
27 {
28  float max = max_threshold - 1;
29  float a = 0.6;
30 
31 
32  threshold = (max/(1 + std::exp((10 * std::abs(velocity))/a - max))) + 0.3;
33  return threshold;
34 }
35 
36 
37 // Returns if the signal exceeds the threshold and the value if it did
38 std::tuple<bool, float> zScore::getSignal(double new_value){
39  // Do we have enough points to start the calculation?
40  current_raw_value = new_value;
41  current_signal = 0;
42  bool signal_found = false;
43  if(lag_values.size() < lag){
44 
45  lag_values.push_back(new_value);
46  return std::make_tuple(signal_found, current_signal);
47 
48  }else{
49 
50  current_mean = getMean(lag_values);
51  current_stdDev = getStdDev(lag_values);
52 
53 
54  if(std::abs(new_value - current_mean) > threshold * current_stdDev){
55  // Note this signal so we can graph it!
56  current_signal = new_value;
57  signal_found = true;
58  // How much weight do we want this new signal to have?
59  new_value = influence * new_value + (1 - influence) * lag_values[lag-1];
60  }
61 
62  publishValues();
63  lag_values.erase(lag_values.begin());
64  lag_values.push_back(new_value);
65  return std::make_tuple(signal_found, current_signal);
66  // At the end incorporate the new value into our list
67  }
68 }
69 
70 /*
71 
72  Private helper functions used above
73 
74 */
75 
76 void zScore::publishValues(){
77 
78  if(this->publish_values){
79  //Create all topics we will publish values to
80  pub_mean.publish(current_mean);
81  pub_positive_threshold.publish(current_mean + current_stdDev * threshold);
82  pub_negative_threshold.publish(current_mean - current_stdDev * threshold);
83  pub_signal.publish(current_signal);
84  pub_raw_value.publish(current_raw_value);
85  }
86 }
87 
88 double zScore::getStdDev(std::vector<double> data){
89  double mean = getMean(data);
90  double accum = 0.0;
91  std::for_each (data.begin(), data.end(), [&](const double d) {
92  accum += (d - mean) * (d - mean);
93  });
94 
95  return sqrt(accum / (lag - 1));
96 }
97 
98 double zScore::getMean(std::vector<double> data){
99  double sum = std::accumulate(data.begin(), data.end(), 0.0);
100  return sum / data.size();
101 }
